item.title: By: Sly
item.dc:creator: Sly
item.description: i literally just pooped my pants.

item.title: By: uruloki
item.dc:creator: uruloki
item.description: I will say this for the CT guys: I haven't seen profiles in other places nearly often as I am seeing their profiles linked. From the forum trolling I do, within a week of the release I was seeing 10% of the players with those profiles. That's not a big number, but I sure don't remember seeing that for RPGOutfitter or WoW PM or WoW Guru.
item.content:encoded: I will say this for the CT guys: I haven’t seen profiles in other places nearly often as I am seeing their profiles linked. From the forum trolling I do, within a week of the release I was seeing 10% of the players with those profiles. That’s not a big number, but I sure don’t remember seeing that for RPGOutfitter or WoW PM or WoW Guru.

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description: Yeah, you and me both. 10 minutes after I posted the comment, I found the checkbox. *blonde moment*
item.content:encoded: Yeah, you and me both. 10 minutes after I posted the comment, I found the checkbox. *blonde moment*

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.content:encoded:
Played with it a bit now. No hover, as you said. That sucks. I had no problems with speed, but this was late in the day.

Seemed accurate for my character, equipment, talents, all add up to the correct HP, resist, etc. totals.

EDIT: I’m blind. You can hover the item stats by clicking the checkbox “Show tooltips on hover”

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description:
It fairly slow (at work), about the same as RPG Outfitter or WoW PM. It doesn't do the hover inspect (click instead). It's still faster than Allakhazam, though.
I still like WoW Roster, although that's single-site only.
item.content:encoded:
It fairly slow (at work), about the same as RPG Outfitter or WoW PM. It doesn’t do the hover inspect (click instead). It’s still faster than Allakhazam, though.

I still like WoW Roster, although that’s single-site only.
